# terser-webpack-plugin

This plugin uses [terser](https://github.com/terser-js/terser) to minify your JavaScript.

## Getting Started

If you are using webpack v5 or above you do not need to install this plugin. Webpack v5 comes with the latest `terser-webpack-plugin` out of the box.

To begin, you'll need to install `terser-webpack-plugin`:

```console
$ npm install terser-webpack-plugin --save-dev
```

Then add the plugin to your `webpack` config. For example:

**webpack.config.js**

```js
const TerserPlugin = require("terser-webpack-plugin");

module.exports = {
  optimization: {
    minimize: true,
    minimizer: [new TerserPlugin()],
  },
};
```

And run `webpack` via your preferred method.

## Note about source maps

**Works only with `source-map`, `inline-source-map`, `hidden-source-map` and `nosources-source-map` values for
